title: FinCEN Targets Crypto Mixers Over Laundering and National Security Concerns
description: The U.S. Treasury Department’s Financial Crimes Enforcement Network, or FinCEN, this week proposed regulations aimed at increasing transparency around crypto mixing services. These services, the agency says, are used by terrorist organizations and state actors to obscure financial transactions. FinCEN refers to these services as “Convertible Virtual Currency Mixing” or CVC mixing. U.S. Treasury Takes […]

title: Bitcoin’s bid to upend capital markets

title: Crypto Analyst Bats Down Predictions of Bitcoin Crash to $20,000 – Here’s Why He Says That Move Is ‘Improbable’
description:
